events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses expected in the upcoming months.
Application was categorised under Personal Loan as medical expense was explicitly mentioned as the reason for funding.
A loan officer specializing in personal loans was assigned to evaluate the applicant’s medical loan request promptly.
Initial review of the application included verification of the stated personal loan purpose and preliminary credit data gathering.
Requested detailed medical bills and identity proofs to verify the legitimacy of the expenses for the personal loan.
Applicant provided all requested documents including medical invoices and government-issued identification promptly.
Credit report was obtained and reviewed showing a moderate credit score with some outstanding debts.
Risk evaluation reflected potential repayment risks due to existing debts but the medical nature of loan was factored positively.
A loan offer outlining terms and interest rates was presented to the applicant for review and feedback.
Applicant accepted the loan terms and requested clarification on repayment schedule flexibility.
Application was escalated to senior underwriter due to inquiries about flexible repayment terms for medical recovery period.
Senior underwriter approved the loan with revised repayment plan accommodating the applicant's medical treatment timeline.
Funds were disbursed to the applicant’s bank account to assist with medical expenses as per the approved loan agreement.
Scheduled follow-up to check on applicant’s satisfaction with the loan process and to remind about upcoming repayments.
Application officially closed after successful loan funding and follow-up confirmation with the applicant.
